basicInfo.name: Branze & Bransel
basicInfo.flavor: Branze and Bransel used their powerful strength to protect the temple from evil spirits invading the village during the war. Then one day, the rubble from a great explosion decimated the temple.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 60% of Physical Attack 2 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 75% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Uncontrollable Power
Skill 1.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals Piercing damage equal to 38% of Physical Attack 3 time(s).
 - Each attack has a 30% chance to inflict Bleed. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Activates again with 100% power upon defeating an enemy with damage from this skill.
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 45% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Chance: Bleed chance becomes 35%.

Skill 2.name: Saviors' Condemnation
Skill 2.desc:
1 Enemy (Back Row First)
 - 100% chance to inflict Buff Duration Reduction. [Reduced by: 3 Turn(s)]
 - Deals damage equal to 247% of Physical Attack 2 time(s).
 - Instant Execution of an enemy with 24% or lower HP.
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 297% of Physical Attack.
 - Adds Effect: 100% chance to inflict Buff Duration Reduction. [Reduced by: 3 Turn(s)]
超越2段階達成効果
 - Self
 - Adds Healing: Heals HP equal to 110% of Physical Attack.
超越6段階達成効果
 - Single Ally
 - Adds Effect: Revives a fallen target with 40% HP upon defeating an enemy with damage from this skill. (If deployed to a team with 3 or more Attack heroes)
 - Adds Effect: Grants All Damage Nullification upon revival. [2 Hit(s)]

Passive.name: Judges of Good and Evil
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Guts. [Once per Battle]
 - Grants All Damage Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants All Damage Immunity upon triggering Guts. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - All Allies
 - Grants Physical Attack Boost when an ally falls in battle. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)] (If deployed to a team with 3 or more Attack heroes)
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 45% of the caster's Physical Attack when an enemy falls in battle. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)] (If deployed to a team with 3 or more Attack heroes)
スキル強化効果
 - Self
 - Adds Effect: Grants All Damage Immunity upon triggering Guts. [2 Turn(s)]

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Branze - Platin, Colt, meat, things that treat him nicely, intense sports\nBransel - Yeonhee, fruit, things that treat him nicely, rest, nature
profile.dislikes: Branze - Pallanus, Mercure, Dellons, bitter food, things that harm him, boredom, gloomy people\nBransel - Pallanus, Mercure, bitter food, things that harm him, vanity, gloomy people, boredom
profile.story: Branze and Bransel used their powerful strength to protect the temple from evil spirits invading the village during the war. Then one day, the rubble from a great explosion decimated the temple.

basicInfo.name: Branze & Bransel
basicInfo.flavor: Starving with nowhere to go, Branze and Bransel ran into an apprentice priest who helped them settle into their new life at the temple. They were often scolded by the high priest because they couldn't control their strength and kept on getting into trouble.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy

スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 55% of Physical Attack.

スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 35% of Physical Attack.

basicInfo.name: Branze & Bransel
basicInfo.flavor: Shunned by heavenly beings due to their angel and demon half-blood status, Branze and Bransel only had themselves to rely on during their childhood. When Branze was banished to Earth after starting a massive fight with the heavenly beings, Bransel followed his big brother.

Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 45% of Physical Attack 2 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 45% of Physical Attack.

 - Activates again with 100% power upon defeating an enemy with damage from this skill.
スキル強化効果

Skill 2.name: Saviors' Condemnation
Skill 2.desc:

 - Instant Execution of an enemy with 12% or lower HP.
